org.eclipse.january.dataset

Class Random

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.january.dataset.Random

  • public class Random
extends Object
    Class to hold methods to create random datasets Emulates numpy.random

      • randn

        public static DoubleDataset randn(int... shape)
        Parameters:
        shape -
        Returns:
        an array of values sampled from a Gaussian distribution with mean 0 and variance 1 (The term Gaussian here is a description of a shape of data taken from the mathematician of the same name Carl Friedrich Gauss http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Carl_Friedrich_Gauss born in 1777.)

      • randn

        Parameters:

        std - standard deviation
        shape -
        Returns:
        an array of values sampled from a Gaussian distribution with given mean and standard deviation
